name: BeatMania IIDX 16: Empress + Premium Best
synopsis: Beatmania IIDX 16: Empress is the 16th game in the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beatmania_IIDX Beatmania IIDX] series of music video games. It was released in arcades by [[Konami]] on November 19, 2008. The game features over 50 new songs, some of which are unlocked over [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E-Amusement Konami's e-Amusement] platform. The design of Empress's interface is based on a pink color scheme, dominated by sparkles, butterfly wings, and motifs of royalty and jewellery. The PlayStation 2 port for the game was released on October 15, 2009, simultaneously in Japan and South Korea.
